trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Fredericksburg
There were no other sightings in Fredericksburg on or around March 19th 2005
divs: sighting detailssighting report: i was playing basketball at my local court, when i heard a looooooo sound and i saw something out of the corner of my eye. i looked over and saw a small craft going through the sky at a reasonable speed. there were 4 lights. 2 of them were blinking several colors rapidly. this occured around 8:40 pm the night of 3\19\05. it was brief, and the skies were clear. it went in a straight line and disappeared over some trees, out of my sight.
